title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1657/1999 of 28 July 1999 fixing the export refunds on white sugar and raw sugar exported in its unaltered state
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1657/1999
of 28 July 1999
fixing the export refunds on white sugar and raw sugar exported in its unaltered state
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The export refunds on the products listed in Article 1 (1) (a) of Regulation (EEC) No 1785/81, undenatured and exported in the natural state, are hereby fixed to the amounts shown in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 29 July 1999.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 28 July 1999.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
